AcceptHeaderInvalid.title: Media type in the Accept header is invalid or not found
AcceptHeaderInvalid.description: The accept header received is not application/taxii+json;version=2.1

UnsupportedAcceptHeader.title: The server only supports TAXII 2.1 response type
UnsupportedAcceptHeader.description: The accept header received is not application/taxii+json;version=2.1

DiscoveryException.title: Failed to Get Discovery Information
DiscoveryException.description: This error is resulted by a failed request to the backend ElasticSearch database

APIRootNotFoundException.title: API Root not found
APIRootNotFoundException.description: This API Root is not configured, you can send a discovery request to get a list of API Roots

DefaultAPIRootNotFoundException.title: Default API Root not configured
DefaultAPIRootNotFoundException.description: A Default API Root is not configured, you can send a discovery request to get a list of API Roots

StatusNotFoundException.title: Status Not Found
StatusNotFoundException.description: The Status with the ID specified is not found under this root

CollectionNotFoundException.title: Collection Not Found
CollectionNotFoundException.description: The Collection with the ID specified is not found under this root
